title: Surrender
description: If you see too many enemies, sometimes it is wise to keep your army save instead of battle.

title: Unit modes
description: These buttons appears after unit selection. Attack - find the nearest target and engage them in melee or ranged combat. Hold ground - do not leave the target hex. Bombard - special mode for bombard units which combines Hold ground with order to target city walls in priority.

title: Manage buttons
description: Skip the battle (will be played by AI) and End turn buttons at the buttom.

title: Status panel
description: This panel show info battle name and weather conditions.
